short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your ChatGPT chat logs with friends or save them to your computer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing CopyGPT - the ultimate Chrome extension for ChatGPT users who want to easily share and save their chat logs! With our seamless integration into the ChatGPT chat window, copying conversations has never been simpler. Compatible with the ChatGPT chat interface, our user-friendly design ensures that you can effortlessly capture and preserve your AI-generated discussions.

CopyGPT adds two handy buttons right next to the message input box in the chat interface, giving you full control over the chat log copying process.

Button 1: Copy Conversation
Capture your entire chat log in a neatly formatted conversation style. Perfect for sharing with friends or archiving for future reference, the output is structured as follows:

You: <Your message>

ChatGPT: <Chat message>

You: <Your message>

ChatGPT: <Chat message>

...

Button 2: Copy Chat Messages Only
If you prefer to focus on the AI-generated content, use this button to copy only the ChatGPT messages. This option is ideal for those who want to incorporate the chat responses into another document without the conversation format.

Why choose CopyGPT?

1. Easy integration: Effortlessly blends into the ChatGPT chat window for seamless user experience.
2. Simple to use: Two clearly labeled buttons make it a breeze to copy your chat logs.
3. Versatile: Choose between copying the entire conversation or just the ChatGPT messages.
4. Shareable: Perfect for sharing AI-generated content with friends or colleagues.
5. Archivable: Save your valuable chat logs to your computer for future reference.

Don't miss out on the chance to enhance your ChatGPT experience with CopyGPT - the ultimate browser extension for capturing, sharing, and preserving your AI-generated conversations. Install it now and unlock the full potential of your ChatGPT chats!


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Add support to code blocks
- Copy buttons work in the different chat conversations history

v1.4:

v1.5:
